mapper.sql: ship_setp_id AS "shipSetpId", ship_setp_name AS "shipSetpName", ship_setp_class_id AS "shipSetpClassId", remark AS "remark", user_id AS "userId", production_station_id AS "productionStationId", accessories AS "accessories", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_ship_setp where 1 = 1
and ship_setp_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.shipSetpId},'%')
and ship_setp_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.shipSetpName},'%')
and ship_setp_class like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.shipSetpClass},'%')
and remark like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.remark},'%')
and accessories like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.accessories},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
